SEARCH
Package components

Class ThreadedCameraRunner

java.lang.Object
components.ThreadedCameraRunner
public class ThreadedCameraRunner extends Object
ThreadedCameraRunner handles the real-time control and capturing of camera data used for creating the finish image and optionally runs OCR by offloading to OCRCapture.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ThreadedCameraRunner()
    Constructs a new ThreadedCameraRunner with the default sound threshold for starting (see CameraStarter documentation for details on the sound thresholding)
    ThreadedCameraRunner(int soundThreshold)
    Constructs a new ThreadedCameraRunner with a specified sound threshold for sound-based starting (see CameraStarter documentation for details on the sound thresholding)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    execute()
    ThreadedCameraRunner.execute() should be called exactly once to start the camera with sound-based starting using CameraStarter and run the camera according to control messages from receiveMessage()
    CompositeFrame
    getCompositeFrame()
    Getter for the CompositeFrame built by the ThreadedCameraRunner
    ArrayList<SingleFrame>
    getOCRStream()
    Getter for the ArrayList representing the second camera's capture, used for OCR
    long
    getSystemStartTime()
    Getter for the system start time of the execution
    void
    receiveMessage(String message)
    Received a control message, either STOP, PAUSE, or RESUME, which is then handled by the control thread to perform the desired action.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ThreadedCameraRunner

      public ThreadedCameraRunner(int soundThreshold)
      Constructs a new ThreadedCameraRunner with a specified sound threshold for sound-based starting (see CameraStarter documentation for details on the sound thresholding)
      Parameters:
      soundThreshold - the sound threshold for starting, from 0 to 256

    • ThreadedCameraRunner

      public ThreadedCameraRunner()
      Constructs a new ThreadedCameraRunner with the default sound threshold for starting (see CameraStarter documentation for details on the sound thresholding)

  • Method Details

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(String message)
      Received a control message, either STOP, PAUSE, or RESUME, which is then handled by the control thread to perform the desired action. This is the only way to communicate with the ThreadedCameraRunner.
      Parameters:
      message - The message / action item for the ThreadedCameraRunner

    • getCompositeFrame

      public CompositeFrame getCompositeFrame()
      Getter for the CompositeFrame built by the ThreadedCameraRunner
      Returns:
      the CompositeFrame associated with the ThreadedCameraRunner

    • execute

      public void execute()
      ThreadedCameraRunner.execute() should be called exactly once to start the camera with sound-based starting using CameraStarter and run the camera according to control messages from receiveMessage()

    • getOCRStream

      public ArrayList<SingleFrame> getOCRStream()
      Getter for the ArrayList representing the second camera's capture, used for OCR
      Returns:
      the OCR ArrayList or null if OCR is not being used

    • getSystemStartTime

      public long getSystemStartTime()
      Getter for the system start time of the execution
      Returns:
      the system start time of the camera run.
